fr.ign.cogit.geoxygene.appli.render

Interface RenderingManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MultithreadedRenderingManager, SyncRenderingManager

    public interface RenderingManager
    RenderingManager is in charge of rendering images on request. It draws all layers and displays a packing of them
    Author:
    Jérémie Turbet (Interface extracted from initial RenderingManager which is now MultithreadedRenderingManager)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addLayer(Layer layer)
      Add a new layer to the manager and create the corresponding renderer.
      void dispose()
      finish RenderingManager execution before quitting Empty all cached values.
      Collection<Layer> getLayers()
      Return the collection of managed layers in the same order they were added.
      LayerRenderer getRenderer(Layer layer) 
      Collection<? extends LayerRenderer> getRenderers()
      Return the collection of managed renderers.
      SelectionRenderer getSelectionRenderer() 
      boolean isHandlingDeletion()
      Is the rendering manager handling the deletion of features when they are rendered.

      Remove a layer from the manager.
